search_results.title: Adam Bradley (literary critic)
search_results.snippet: Adam Bradley (born 1974) is an American literary critic, professor, and a writer on popular culture. He is the author or editor of six books.

search_results.title: Anthony B. Bradley: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Anthony B. Bradley, Ph.D., is Professor of Religious Studies at The King's College in New York City and serves as a Research Fellow at the Acton Institute.

search_results.title: A. C. Bradley
search_results.snippet: Andrew Cecil Bradley, FBA (26 March 1851 – 2 September 1935) was an English literary scholar, best remembered for his work on Shakespeare.
